function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of false information and unproven remedies through social networks","Impact":"Misinformation can lead to panic, incorrect treatment, and non-compliance with official guidelines","Mitigation":"Implement fact-checking processes and promote reliable sources of information on social networks","Technologies":"AI algorithms for detecting and flagging misinformation, content moderation tools","People":"General population, individuals seeking information on social networks","Owner":"Social media platforms, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Propagation of panic-inducing content on social networks","Impact":"Increased fear and anxiety among the population, leading to negative mental health effects","Mitigation":"Promote positive and reassuring content, provide mental health resources and support on social networks","Technologies":"AI sentiment analysis to identify panic-inducing content, mental health chatbots and support groups","People":"General population using social media, especially those vulnerable to anxiety and stress","Owner":"Mental health organizations, social media platforms"},{"Description":"Ineffective communication of official guidelines and measures on social networks","Impact":"Lack of awareness and compliance with government measures, leading to higher spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Utilize targeted and clear communication strategies, collaborate with social media influencers to promote official guidelines","Technologies":"Data analytics to target specific demographics, influencer marketing platforms","People":"General population active on social media, influencers and celebrities","Owner":"Government health agencies, social media platforms"}]}
